titles.title: A bill to extend the duty reduction on artichokes, prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid.
A bill to extend the duty reduction on artichokes, prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary: Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to extend the duty reduction on artichokes, prepared or preserved by vinegar or acetic acid.
